actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To promote the greater use of recycled paper by mailers of third-class mail matter.

summary.text: Directs the United States Postal Service to study and report to the Congress on ways to encourage the greater use of recycled paper by mailers of third-class mail matter along with recommendations for appropriate legislation.

titles.title: To promote the greater use of recycled paper by mailers of third-class mail matter.
